Description: What you'll do:- Optimize the resolution of bottlenecks that impede team members’ performance to enhance overall organizational effectiveness and efficiency.- Analyze data around sales, and performance KPIs to make informed decisions on how to boost district revenues while ensuring customer satisfaction.-  Be a Subject-Matter Expert on larger processes and activities within your site, i.e., 5s audits, alignment with Standard Work procedures across the network.- Manage data collection to update operations metrics to achieve performance targets, reduce cost per order, eliminate errors and thus deliver excellent customer service.- Work closely with other support teams (HR, Accounting, Warehouse, Facilities, IT) on staffing plans schedules, and performance levels to enable the dark stores to attain Breadfast’s Business Plan.What you'll need:Job Details
